text: Holger Felix Badstuber (born 13 March 1989) is a German former professional footballer who played as a centre-back or left-back. ==Career statistics== ===Club=== Appearances and goals by club, season and competition Club Season League National cup Continental Other Total Division Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Bayern Munich II 2007–08 Regionalliga Süd 23 4 — — — 23 4 2008–09 3.
